column5: Check basic Salt communication: This should return True if Salt is functioning correctly on the syndic.
Check key acceptance: Check if the syndic's key is in the 'Accepted Keys' list.
Check master configuration: Ensure that order_masters is set to True on the master.
Check that the necessary ports (typically 4505 and 4506) are open.
Check syndic logs for more detailed error messages.
Check syndic configuration: Check if syndic_master is correctly set to the master's address.
Check master logs for any related errors.
